verses.verse: וַתֵּ֣רֶא <S%H7200><s%> saw רָחֵ֗ל <S%H7354><s%> And when Rachel כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> no יָֽלְדָה֙ <S%H3205><s%> that she bare לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וַתְּקַנֵּ֥א <S%H7065><s%> envied רָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> no children Rachel בַּאֲחֹתָ֑הּ <S%H269><s%> her sister וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> Give לִּ֣י בָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> me children וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> or אַ֖יִן <S%H369><s%> or else מֵתָ֥ה <S%H4191><s%> I die אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> I

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> anger יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob's בְּרָחֵ֑ל <S%H7354><s%> against Rachel וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said הֲתַ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> the place אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> [Am] I in God's אָנֹ֔כִי <S%H595><s%> I אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who מָנַ֥ע <S%H4513><s%> stead who hath withheld מִמֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at פְּרִי־ <S%H6529><s%> from thee the fruit בָֽטֶן׃ <S%H990><s%> belly

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Here אֲמָתִ֥י <S%H519><s%> Behold my maid בִלְהָ֖ה <S%H1090><s%> Bilhah בֹּ֣א <S%H935><s%> go in אֵלֶ֑יהָ <S%H413><s%> to וְתֵלֵד֙ <S%H3205><s%> unto her and she shall bear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בִּרְכַּ֔י <S%H1290><s%> upon my knees וְאִבָּנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> that I may also have children גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> too אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> that מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <S%H4480><s%> through

וַתִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> And she gave ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּלְהָ֥ה <S%H1090><s%> him Bilhah שִׁפְחָתָ֖הּ <S%H8198><s%> her handmaid לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> to wife וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> went in אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> and יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob
וַתַּ֣הַר <S%H2029><s%> conceived בִּלְהָ֔ה <S%H1090><s%> And Bilhah וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> a son

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said רָחֵל֙ <S%H7354><s%> And Rachel דָּנַ֣נִּי <S%H1777><s%> hath judged אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> indeed שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> me and hath also heard בְּקֹלִ֔י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and hath given לִ֖י בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> me a son עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרְאָ֥ה <S%H7121><s%> therefore called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she his name דָּֽן׃ <S%H1835><s%> Dan

וַתַּ֣הַר <S%H2029><s%> conceived ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again וַתֵּ֕לֶד <S%H3205><s%> again and bare בִּלְהָ֖ה <S%H1090><s%> And Bilhah שִׁפְחַ֣ת <S%H8198><s%> maid רָחֵ֑ל <S%H7354><s%> Rachel's בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> son שֵׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> a second לְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said רָחֵ֗ל <S%H7354><s%> And Rachel נַפְתּוּלֵ֨י <S%H5319><s%> wrestlings אֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> With great נִפְתַּ֛לְתִּי <S%H6617><s%> have I wrestled עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲחֹתִ֖י <S%H269><s%> with my sister גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> have indeed יָכֹ֑לְתִּי <S%H3201><s%> and I have prevailed וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name נַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <S%H5321><s%> Naphtali

וַתֵּ֣רֶא <S%H7200><s%> saw לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> When Leah כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עָמְדָ֖ה <S%H5975><s%> that she had left מִלֶּ֑דֶת <S%H3205><s%> bearing וַתִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> she took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִלְפָּ֣ה <S%H2153><s%> Zilpah שִׁפְחָתָ֔הּ <S%H8198><s%> her maid וַתִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> her Jacob לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife
וַתֵּ֗לֶד <S%H3205><s%> bare זִלְפָּ֛ה <S%H2153><s%> And Zilpah שִׁפְחַ֥ת <S%H8198><s%> maid לֵאָ֖ה <S%H3812><s%> Leah's לְיַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> a son

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לֵאָ֖ה <S%H3812><s%> And Leah [בְּגָד כ] (בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> abide ק) (גָ֑ד <S%H1409><s%> troop ק) וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and she called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name גָּֽד׃ <S%H1410><s%> Gad

וַתֵּ֗לֶד <S%H3205><s%> bare זִלְפָּה֙ <S%H2153><s%> And Zilpah שִׁפְחַ֣ת <S%H8198><s%> maid לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> Leah's בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> son שֵׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> a second לְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> And Leah בְּאָשְׁרִ֕י <S%H837><s%> Happy am I כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִשְּׁר֖וּנִי <S%H833><s%> will call me blessed בָּנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> for the daughters וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and she called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name אָשֵֽׁר׃ <S%H836><s%> Asher

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went רְאוּבֵ֜ן <S%H7205><s%> And Reuben בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> the days קְצִיר־ <S%H7105><s%> harvest חִטִּ֗ים <S%H2406><s%> of wheat וַיִּמְצָ֤א <S%H4672><s%> and found דֽוּדָאִים֙ <S%H1736><s%> mandrakes בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וַיָּבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> and brought אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about לֵאָ֖ה <S%H3812><s%> Leah אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> them unto his mother וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said רָחֵל֙ <S%H7354><s%> Then Rachel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> to Leah תְּנִי־ <S%H5414><s%> Give me נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please לִ֔י מִדּוּדָאֵ֖י <S%H1736><s%> mandrakes בְּנֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1121><s%> I pray thee of thy son's

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said לָ֗הּ הַמְעַט֙ <S%H4592><s%> unto her [Is it] a small matter קַחְתֵּ֣ךְ <S%H3947><s%> that thou hast taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִישִׁ֔י <S%H582><s%> you וְלָקַ֕חַת <S%H3947><s%> to take גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דּוּדָאֵ֖י <S%H1736><s%> mandrakes בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> my son's וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said רָחֵ֗ל <S%H7354><s%> also? And Rachel לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יִשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> Therefore he shall lie עִמָּךְ֙ <S%H5973><s%> you הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> with thee to night תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> for דּוּדָאֵ֥י <S%H1736><s%> mandrakes בְנֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1121><s%> thy son's

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׂדֶה֮ <S%H7704><s%> out of the field בָּעֶרֶב֒ <S%H6153><s%> in the evening וַתֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> went out לֵאָ֜ה <S%H3812><s%> and Leah לִקְרָאת֗וֹ <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> him and said אֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> about תָּב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> Thou must come in כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׂכֹ֣ר <S%H7936><s%> unto me for surely שְׂכַרְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H7936><s%> I have hired בְּדוּדָאֵ֖י <S%H1736><s%> mandrakes בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> thee with my son's וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> And he lay עִמָּ֖הּ <S%H5973><s%> her that בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> with her that night הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לֵאָ֑ה <S%H3812><s%> unto Leah וַתַּ֛הַר <S%H2029><s%> and she conceived וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> son חֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H2549><s%> the fifth

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לֵאָ֗ה <S%H3812><s%> And Leah נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God שְׂכָרִ֔י <S%H7939><s%> me my hire אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> because נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have given שִׁפְחָתִ֖י <S%H8198><s%> my maiden לְאִישִׁ֑י <S%H376><s%> to my husband וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name יִשָּׂשכָֽר׃ <S%H3485><s%> Issachar

וַתַּ֤הַר <S%H2029><s%> conceived עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> And Leah וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> again and bare בֵּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son שִׁשִּׁ֖י <S%H8345><s%> the sixth לְּיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לֵאָ֗ה <S%H3812><s%> And Leah זְבָדַ֨נִי <S%H2064><s%> hath endued אֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> God אֹתִי֮ <S%H853><s%> זֵ֣בֶד <S%H2065><s%> dowry טוֹב֒ <S%H2896><s%> me [with] a good הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <S%H6471><s%> now יִזְבְּלֵ֣נִי <S%H2082><s%> dwell אִישִׁ֔י <S%H376><s%> will my husband כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because יָלַ֥דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> with me because I have born ל֖וֹ שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> him six בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and she called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name זְבֻלֽוּן׃ <S%H2074><s%> Zebulun

וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> And afterwards יָ֣לְדָה <S%H3205><s%> she bare בַּ֑ת <S%H1323><s%> a daughter וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> her name דִּינָֽה׃ <S%H1783><s%> Dinah

וַיִּזְכֹּ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> remembered אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָחֵ֑ל <S%H7354><s%> Rachel וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> and אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> and God וַיִּפְתַּ֖ח <S%H6605><s%> to her and opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַחְמָֽהּ׃ <S%H7358><s%> her womb

וַתַּ֖הַר <S%H2029><s%> And she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אָסַ֥ף <S%H622><s%> hath taken away אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶרְפָּתִֽי׃ <S%H2781><s%> my reproach

וַתִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> And she called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֛וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said יֹסֵ֧ף <S%H3254><s%> shall add יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לִ֖י בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> son אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> to me another

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after יָלְדָ֥ה <S%H3205><s%> had born רָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> And it came to pass when Rachel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> that Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לָבָ֔ן <S%H3837><s%> unto Laban שַׁלְּחֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H7971><s%> Send me away וְאֵ֣לְכָ֔ה <S%H1980><s%> may go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹמִ֖י <S%H4725><s%> unto mine own place וּלְאַרְצִֽי׃ <S%H776><s%> and to my country

תְּנָ֞ה <S%H5414><s%> Give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָשַׁ֣י <S%H802><s%> [me] my wives וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְלָדַ֗י <S%H3206><s%> and my children אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom עָבַ֧דְתִּי <S%H5647><s%> whom I have served אֹֽתְךָ֛ <S%H853><s%> בָּהֵ֖ן <S%H2004><s%> for וְאֵלֵ֑כָה <S%H1980><s%> depart כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> yourself יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> for thou knowest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבֹדָתִ֖י <S%H5656><s%> my service אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עֲבַדְתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H5647><s%> which I have done

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> But לָבָ֔ן <S%H3837><s%> And Laban אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If נָ֛א <S%H4994><s%> now מָצָ֥אתִי <S%H4672><s%> unto him I pray thee if I have found חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> favour בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thine eyes נִחַ֕שְׁתִּי <S%H5172><s%> [tarry for] I have learned by experience וַיְבָרֲכֵ֥נִי <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD בִּגְלָלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1558><s%> me for thy sake
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> And he said נָקְבָ֧ה <S%H5344><s%> Appoint שְׂכָרְךָ֛ <S%H7939><s%> me thy wages עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> and I וְאֶתֵּֽנָה׃ <S%H5414><s%> and I will give

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> yourself יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> unto him Thou knowest אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> how עֲבַדְתִּ֑יךָ <S%H5647><s%> I have served וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> thee and how הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> have fared מִקְנְךָ֖ <S%H4735><s%> thy cattle אִתִּֽי׃ <S%H854><s%> for

כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for מְעַט֩ <S%H4592><s%> For [it was] little אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> had לְךָ֤ לְפָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> which thou hadst before I וַיִּפְרֹ֣ץ <S%H6555><s%> [came] and it is [now] increased לָרֹ֔ב <S%H7230><s%> unto a multitude וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> לְרַגְלִ֑י <S%H7272><s%> thee since my coming וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now מָתַ֛י <S%H4970><s%> and now when אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shall I provide גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> own לְבֵיתִֽי׃ <S%H1004><s%> for mine own house

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What אֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> What shall I give thee לָ֑ךְ וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> ? And Jacob לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> Thou shalt not give לִ֣י מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> me any thing אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> if thou wilt do לִּי֙ הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אָשׁ֛וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> for me I will again אֶרְעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> feed צֹֽאנְךָ֖ <S%H6629><s%> thy flock אֶשְׁמֹֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> [and] keep

אֶֽעֱבֹ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> I will pass בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> your entire צֹֽאנְךָ֜ <S%H6629><s%> through all thy flock הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to day הָסֵ֨ר <S%H5493><s%> removing מִשָּׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every שֶׂ֣ה ׀ <S%H7716><s%> cattle נָקֹ֣ד <S%H5348><s%> from thence all the speckled וְטָל֗וּא <S%H2921><s%> and spotted וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every שֶׂה־ <S%H7716><s%> cattle חוּם֙ <S%H2345><s%> and all the brown בַּכְּשָׂבִ֔ים <S%H3775><s%> among the sheep וְטָל֥וּא <S%H2921><s%> and the spotted וְנָקֹ֖ד <S%H5348><s%> and speckled בָּעִזִּ֑ים <S%H5795><s%> among the goats וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become שְׂכָרִֽי׃ <S%H7939><s%> and [of such] shall be my hire

וְעָֽנְתָה־ <S%H6030><s%> answer בִּ֤י צִדְקָתִי֙ <S%H6666><s%> So shall my righteousness בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for me in time מָחָ֔ר <S%H4279><s%> to come כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when תָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> when it shall come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning שְׂכָרִ֖י <S%H7939><s%> for my hire לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before thy face כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> every one אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that אֵינֶנּוּ֩ <S%H369><s%> is not נָקֹ֨ד <S%H5348><s%> that [is] not speckled וְטָל֜וּא <S%H2921><s%> and spotted בָּֽעִזִּ֗ים <S%H5795><s%> among the goats וְחוּם֙ <S%H2345><s%> and brown בַּכְּשָׂבִ֔ים <S%H3775><s%> among the sheep גָּנ֥וּב <S%H1589><s%> that shall be counted stolen ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אִתִּֽי׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> And Laban הֵ֑ן <S%H2005><s%> Good ל֖וּ <S%H3863><s%> Behold I would it might be יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> it be according כִדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1697><s%> according to thy word

וַיָּ֣סַר <S%H5493><s%> And he removed בַּיּוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֨וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּיָשִׁ֜ים <S%H8495><s%> the he goats הָֽעֲקֻדִּ֣ים <S%H6124><s%> that were ringstraked וְהַטְּלֻאִ֗ים <S%H2921><s%> and spotted וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָֽעִזִּים֙ <S%H5795><s%> and all the she goats הַנְּקֻדּ֣וֹת <S%H5348><s%> that were speckled וְהַטְּלֻאֹ֔ת <S%H2921><s%> and spotted כֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> every אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> with לָבָן֙ <S%H3836><s%> [and] every one that had [some] white בּ֔וֹ וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> one ח֖וּם <S%H2345><s%> in it and all the brown בַּכְּשָׂבִ֑ים <S%H3775><s%> among the sheep וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> [them] into the hand בָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> of his sons

וַיָּ֗שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he set דֶּ֚רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> journey שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days' בֵּינ֖וֹ <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> betwixt himself and Jacob וְיַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob רֹעֶ֛ה <S%H7462><s%> fed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> flocks לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> of Laban's הַנּוֹתָרֹֽת׃ <S%H3498><s%> the rest

וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> took ל֣וֹ יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob מַקַּ֥ל <S%H4731><s%> him rods לִבְנֶ֛ה <S%H3839><s%> poplar לַ֖ח <S%H3892><s%> of green וְל֣וּז <S%H3869><s%> and of the hazel וְעֶרְמ֑וֹן <S%H6196><s%> and chesnut tree וַיְפַצֵּ֤ל <S%H6478><s%> and pilled בָּהֵן֙ פְּצָל֣וֹת <S%H6479><s%> strakes לְבָנ֔וֹת <S%H3836><s%> white מַחְשֹׂף֙ <S%H4286><s%> appear הַלָּבָ֔ן <S%H3836><s%> in them and made the white אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in הַמַּקְלֽוֹת׃ <S%H4731><s%> which [was] in the rods

וַיַּצֵּ֗ג <S%H3322><s%> And he set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּקְלוֹת֙ <S%H4731><s%> the rods אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which פִּצֵּ֔ל <S%H6478><s%> which he had pilled בָּרֳהָטִ֖ים <S%H7298><s%> in the gutters בְּשִֽׁקֲת֣וֹת <S%H8268><s%> troughs הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> in the watering אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> where תָּבֹ֨אןָ <S%H935><s%> came הַצֹּ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> the flocks לִשְׁתּוֹת֙ <S%H8354><s%> to drink לְנֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> before הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> when the flocks וַיֵּחַ֖מְנָה <S%H3179><s%> that they should conceive בְּבֹאָ֥ן <S%H935><s%> when they came לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <S%H8354><s%> to drink

וַיֶּחֱמ֥וּ <S%H3179><s%> conceived הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> And the flocks אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> by הַמַּקְל֑וֹת <S%H4731><s%> before the rods וַתֵּלַ֣דְןָ <S%H3205><s%> and brought forth הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> cattle עֲקֻדִּ֥ים <S%H6124><s%> ringstraked נְקֻדִּ֖ים <S%H5348><s%> speckled וּטְלֻאִֽים׃ <S%H2921><s%> and spotted

וְהַכְּשָׂבִים֮ <S%H3775><s%> the lambs הִפְרִ֣יד <S%H6504><s%> did separate יַעֲקֹב֒ <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob וַ֠יִּתֵּן <S%H5414><s%> and set פְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> the faces הַצֹּ֧אן <S%H6629><s%> of the flocks אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward עָקֹ֛ד <S%H6124><s%> the ringstraked וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all ח֖וּם <S%H2345><s%> and all the brown בְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> in the flock לָבָ֑ן <S%H3837><s%> of Laban וַיָּֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7896><s%> and he put ל֤וֹ עֲדָרִים֙ <S%H5739><s%> his own flocks לְבַדּ֔וֹ <S%H905><s%> apart וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not שָׁתָ֖ם <S%H7896><s%> by themselves and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> cattle לָבָֽן׃ <S%H3837><s%> them not unto Laban's

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> whenever יַחֵם֮ <S%H3179><s%> did conceive הַצֹּ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> cattle הַמְקֻשָּׁרוֹת֒ <S%H7194><s%> And it came to pass whensoever the stronger וְשָׂ֨ם <S%H7760><s%> laid יַעֲקֹ֧ב <S%H3290><s%> that Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּקְל֛וֹת <S%H4731><s%> the rods לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> before the eyes הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> of the cattle בָּרֳהָטִ֑ים <S%H7298><s%> in the gutters לְיַחְמֵ֖נָּה <S%H3179><s%> that they might conceive בַּמַּקְלֽוֹת׃ <S%H4731><s%> among the rods

וּבְהַעֲטִ֥יף <S%H5848><s%> were feeble הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> But when the cattle לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָשִׂ֑ים <S%H7760><s%> he put [them] not in וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָעֲטֻפִים֙ <S%H5848><s%> so the feebler לְלָבָ֔ן <S%H3837><s%> were Laban's וְהַקְּשֻׁרִ֖ים <S%H7194><s%> and the stronger לְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob's

וַיִּפְרֹ֥ץ <S%H6555><s%> increased הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man מְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> exceedingly מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> exceedingly וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and had לוֹ֙ צֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> cattle רַבּ֔וֹת <S%H7227><s%> and had much וּשְׁפָחוֹת֙ <S%H8198><s%> and maidservants וַעֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> and menservants וּגְמַלִּ֖ים <S%H1581><s%> and camels וַחֲמֹרִֽים׃ <S%H2543><s%> and asses
